precondition: The mouse cursor is visible on the desktop.
expected_results: A context menu will appear with options such as "Arrange Icons By", "Refresh", "Paste", "Paste Shortcut", "New", and "Properties".

precondition: The desktop context menu is open with the 'Properties' option highlighted.
expected_results: The context menu will close, and the 'Display Properties' window will open. The 'Theme' dropdown menu in the 'Display Properties' window will display 'Windows Classic (Modified)'.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected. The 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu should be visible.
action: Click the 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu and select 'Starfield'.
expected_results: The 'Wait' text field and 'On resume, password protect' checkbox will disappear.

precondition: The "Screen Saver" dropdown menu within the "Display Properties" window is open.
action: Click on the "(None" option in the "Screen Saver" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Screen Saver" dropdown menu will close.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Turn off monitor" setting is set to "After 20 mins".
action: Click the "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu and select "Never".
expected_results: The "Turn off monitor" setting will change to "Never".

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is selected. The "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu within the "Settings for Home/Office Desk power scheme" section is visible.
action: Click the "After 5 hours" option within the "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Turn off monitor" setting will change to "After 5 hours".

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open with the "Turn off monitor" setting set to "Never".
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will close.
